pageContext.claim: “I'll just tell you that Heidi, who I've gotten to know a little bit, will always vote for Schumer and Pelosi. It's very simple. That's not our agenda.”
pageContext.analysis: Sen. Heidi Heitkamp has voted with Trump 55.3 percent of the time. By contrast, Sen. Charles E. Schumer (D-N.Y.), by contrast, has voted with Trump 25 percent of time while Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) voted with Trump 20 percent.
